title: Forever
description: Everything has been leading them to this moment…Jonathon and Kylie have something The Originals want…Something The Originals will fight to the death to have…Something Jonathon and Kylie will die to protect…War is looming between vampires and The Originals…Forever has never looked so far away…Just when Jonathon and Kylie thought they had found their forever everything changes.Expected release date: Late 2012/Early 2013
author: Micalea Smeltzer
